resources.string:
v2.2.10-02
 Apparently text alerts are crashing Cadpage on some Samsung devices. This release attempts to fix that.
 
 v2.2.10-01
 Updated to be fully compatible with Android 12.
 
 Disabling battery optimization is now mandatory under Android 12. Actually battery consumption should be unaffected.
 
 v2.2.09-07

 Gibson County, TN
